title: Marketplace Roundtable #8: REITs Offering Value, with Brad Thomas
description: Real estate is a long-lived asset, but REITs seem to trade on short-term sentiment time and again. That opens up opportunities, according to Brad Thomas of Rhino Real Estate Advisors. He joins the Marketplace Roundtable to talk about the opportunities he sees in communications REITs, industrial REITs, and other corners of the growing real estate market.
itunes:title: REITs Offering Value, with Brad Thomas
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: 2018 was rough for the real estate sector, but that means the long-lived assets offer value, according to Brad Thomas.
